definition: used for 師傅|师傅 (in Taiwan)/master/qualified worker
father's elder brother/term of respect for older man/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Before you can minister to anyone, you must first be able to minister to your heavenly Father.
sentences.chinese: 你必须先服事你在天上的父，才能去服事别人。

sentences.english: Determines if child recordsets are synchronized to movements in parent recordsets.
sentences.chinese: 确定是否将子记录集与父记录集中的移动保持同步。

sentences.english: A father of the fatherless, and a judge of the widows, is God in his holy habitation.
sentences.chinese: 神在他的圣所作孤儿的父，作寡妇的伸冤者。

sentences.english: E. g. Don't became dejected. Courage is the father of success.
sentences.chinese: 不要气馁，勇气是成功之父。

sentences.english: Bankes, a computer scientist, is the father of new methods for computer simulations.
sentences.chinese: 班克斯是电脑科学家，是许多电脑模拟新方法之父。

sentences.english: Our Father, Jesus, Hallowed be your name.
sentences.chinese: 我们的父，耶稣，愿人都尊你的名为圣。

sentences.english: What makes him the 'father' of American fiction?
sentences.chinese: 是什么造就他成为“美国小说之父”？

sentences.english: Nowadays, Wang Luobin is considered the Father of Chinese Folk Music.
sentences.chinese: 如今，王洛宾被认为是中国民族音乐之父。

sentences.english: Today is the 136 anniversary of Andersen , father of fairy tale.
sentences.chinese: 今天是“童话之父”安徒生去世136周年。

sentences.english: Mr. Roger Tsien is the nephew of Doc. Qian Xuesen, the Father of Chinese missiles.
sentences.chinese: 钱永健是中国导弹之父钱学森的堂侄。

sentences.english: The discovery was foreseen more than 150 years ago by Michael Faraday, the father of electricity.
sentences.chinese: 电学之父法拉第早到150年前就预见了这个发现。

sentences.english: When man fuses with his Father Fragment, he is then Eternal.
sentences.chinese: 当一个人与父之片段相融合，他就是永恒的。

sentences.english: Sub-folders are shown within their parent by default.
sentences.chinese: 默认情况下，子文件夹会在父文件夹内显示。

sentences.english: Many historians consider him the father of Greek tragedies.
sentences.chinese: 许多历史学家认为他是希腊悲剧之父。

sentences.english: Chaucer was the father of English poetry.
sentences.chinese: 乔叟是英国的诗歌之父。

sentences.english: You must re-select the parent before you can modify this component.
sentences.chinese: 修改该组件前，必须重新选择父组件。

definition: Zhangzi county in Shanxi 山西[Shan1 xi1]
father's elder brother/senior/paternal elder uncle/eldest of brothers/respectful form of address/Count, third of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]
father and elder brother(s)/head of the family/patriarch

public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
